DataElement.preferredName: Axillary Lymph Node Staging Performed Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether staging, determining the extent of a cancer within the body, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body, of the axillary lymph nodes, lymph nodes located in the armpit that drain the lymphatic vessels that originate from the breast tissue, was performed

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the staging, determining the extent of a cancer within the body, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body, of the axillary lymph nodes, lymph nodes located in the armpit that drain the lymphatic vessels that originate from the breast tissue, being performed.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Lymph nodes found in the armpit that drain the lymph channels from the breast.

Concepts.definition: One of approximately 20-30 lymph nodes in chain formation that traverse the concavity of the underarm to the clavicle.

Property.preferredDefinition: The extent of a cancer within the body, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body.:Performed; carried out.

Concepts.definition: The process of defining at what point in the natural history of a malignant disease a patient is when a diagnosis is made.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have a surgical axillary staging procedure prior to randomization

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient undergo axillary staging (sentinel node biopsy and/or axillary node dissection)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient undergone axillary staging with sentinel node biopsy (SNB), targeted axillary dissection (TAD), or axillary lymph node dissection (ALND)?
